body.name: OontZ Solo Bluetooth Speaker, Loud Small Bluetooth Speaker, Stocking Stuffer Electronic Wireless Mini Speaker, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 49 mins
features: MINI SPEAKER THAT PACKS A PUNCH! The OontZ Solo Small Bluetooth Speaker is engineered to deliver an audio experience that transcends its compact size. With a focus on premium sound quality, it boasts high-fidelity audio reproduction that brings out the subtleties in your music. From deep bass to crystal-clear treble, every note is rendered with precision, ensuring you experience your favorite tracks in all their glory.

LOUD & POWERFUL AUDIO: Despite its diminutive stature, the OontZ Solo packs a punch in the sound department. Its compact design doesn't compromise on output power, making it perfect for those who demand impressive sound without the bulk. Whether you're on a hike, at the beach, or in your backyard, this speaker ensures your music can be heard loud and clear.

HOURS OF PLAYTIME: The OontZ Solo doesn't leave you hanging in the middle of your music enjoyment. Equipped with a high-capacity battery, it provides an impressive 10 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. You can trust it to keep your tunes going throughout the day, ensuring your entertainment isn't cut short.

COMPACT & PORTABLE: Crafted with the on-the-go lifestyle in mind, the OontZ Solo is your perfect travel companion. Its small and lightweight form factor, along with its convenient carry strap, makes it incredibly portable. Slip it into your bag, pocket, or backpack and take it wherever you go, ensuring that your music is always within reach.

GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: Looking for a thoughtful and versatile gift? The OontZ Solo is not just a speaker; it's a present that caters to the desires of music lovers, outdoor enthusiasts, and anyone who appreciates quality audio in a portable package. Whether it's a birthday, holiday celebration, or a special occasion, this speaker is a gift that will be cherished and enjoyed, offering the gift of exceptional sound on the go.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE SMALL SPEAKER THAT PACKS A PUNCH! OontZ Solo Bluetooth Speaker - Compact, Durable, Powerful OontZ Solo is the PERFECT ON THE GO TRAVEL SPEAKER. Designed and Engineered by Cambridge Sound Works in the USA, this small wireless speaker provides fast connection and an incredible wireless range of up to 100 unobstructed feet from your device.

CHRISTMAS STOCKING STUFFER The OontZ Solo Bluetooth speaker is the ideal present for those who appreciate the gift of music and cool gadgets during this special time of year. SMALL YET POWERFUL 5+ watt power AMP from a custom neodymium driver and bass radiator - for top quality full range, crystal clear sound, and bass beyond its size. 10-HOUR BATTERY LIFE Excellent battery life of up to 10 hours when set to 2/3rd volume on a full charge! Enjoy streaming your music on your device from morning till night! COMPACT & LOUD STYLISH SPEAKER Its triangular design with no hard corners easily fits in your hand or the cup holder in your car. No distortion even when playing at maximum volume!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Travel Companion!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐✨ (4.5/5) rounded up to 5 ⭐ :)I've had the OontZ Angle Solo Bluetooth Portable Speaker by Cambridge Soundworks for three years now, and it's still performing as if it were brand new. Its compact size has made it my go-to travel companion, and I've been pleasantly surprised by its resilience. Whether it's packed snugly in my suitcase or tossed into my backpack, this speaker has proven its durability time and time again. I've accidentally dropped it on more than one occasion, and it's held up impressively without any noticeable decline in performance.In terms of functionality, it boasts a commendable wireless range, ensuring that I can move around freely without losing connection. The sound quality is clear, with a surprisingly loud volume output and rich bass for its size. Connecting it to my devices has always been a breeze, and the battery life is satisfactory, with easy charging options.All in all, the OontZ Angle Solo is a reliable and robust portable speaker that offers great value for its price. Whether you're traveling or just lounging at home, it's sure to enhance your audio experience. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little speaker
reviews.reviewText: I had an issue with my car speakers and had the idea to give this speaker a go, using it as an alternative to listening to music… it worked better than I thought it would! Plenty of sound from such a small device and after 6 months or so, it’s been quite reliable. No instances of not working, or the battery dying unexpectedly. It also fits in a cup holder to give you an idea of its size.If you want a small sized speaker for portability, I’d definitely recommend this one at its price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker for an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased a total of 4 of the Oontz speakers. I have one of the Angle 3 models permanently paired with my Echo device in a bedroom. My second one was an Angle 3 with the older style USB cables. I gave that one away after about 3 years using it to get one with USB C charging cable. I gave that one to a friend and they are using it every day for podcasts. I bought a new Angle 3 for myself for use with my phone. I use it all around the house. I garden with it and when friends are visiting on the patio, it comes with us.I’m really happy with my little, mobile speakers. The charge they hold is great. The sound is really pretty good, especially for a little speaker. And I just bought the little Solo for use as a computer speaker.All four of mine have been reliable and consistant in playing. I did buy a new micro USB cord that was longer than the 3ft that came with the unit. It does not come with the plug-in but I have so many of those already, that I didn't care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easier to connect than Apple Watch to an Apple phone. Surprisingly loud for such a small speaker. Nice shape with non slip feet on the bottom. Good price. Wish it had less bass, but that just may be personal preference. Hopefully it lasts a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with my Xiegu G90 radio
reviews.reviewText: I read somewhere that this would work with my Xiegu G90 radio using a 3.5 mm jack in headphone jack (not Bluetooth. I tried it and it works great. Once you plug a 3.5 mm jack into the Oontz speaker it disables Bluetooth on the speaker. Great for portable ops since it's battery operated. It can also be used when it's charging and you can leave it connected too. Amazing how much sound you gat out of this little device

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I'm old enough to remember how exciting it was to carry around portable transistor radios with tinny speakers in the 1960s. But I've also had top-end stereo systems. This is neither, but way closer to a quality sound system. The sound quality, bass and treble mix is surprisingly good, especially since I use it to play streaming music from my smart phone via bluetooth. Light and portable, with great battery life and quick USB recharges. And a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely solid little speaker.
reviews.reviewText: I have had a black model for some time of the OontZ Angle Solo, and decided to get another for keeping solely at home because I enjoy using it so much. These little guys are fairly rugged for travel, no need to worry about them in a backpack or backseat, and connect quick and easy. Good sound quality for something simple like providing ambiance for tabletop gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for the price
reviews.reviewText: I had this little speaker for so many years and used it regularly. I love the size and the shape of it. Also, for such a small, inexpensive speaker, it bumped. (Decent bass) it never stopped working and would stay charged for a long time. Unfortunately, I lost it. Just haven't purchased another speaker since then but may end up buying this one again.
Muy recomendable excelente sonido y compacto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: If only it wasn't made in China
reviews.reviewText: It works really well, good sound, easy connectivity, US design, alas made in China, big, big sigh.
La segunda vez que la compro, muy resistante!

reviews.reviewTitle: A very impressive speaker for the price
reviews.reviewText: I picked this speaker up because I wanted something inexpensive and relatively durable I could use to listen to music and podcasts in the shower. My previous shower speaker (one of the round ones with the suction cup on the bottom) put out barely enough volume to be audible over running water. This speaker however, despite its small size, is easily loud enough to be heard clearly even at half volume.At near full volume it is easily capable of being heard from at least the next room over, and delivers a fairly full bass sound and clear high range as well. My only criticism is that at maximum volume I did notice some distortion, however it is not at all necessary to set the volume this high if you are in remotely close proximity to it.I was so impressed with the device that I elected to use it more generally around the house in place of a smart speaker.On a single charge I was able to listen to use it for more than 8 hours, at a louder volume that the speaker in my iPhone is capable of outputting (which was roughly 30-35% of the maximum volume of the Oontz), and the battery was only depleted by 50%.All this for only $20. I can't recommend it enough.
Súper compacta con gran capacidad de volumen y calidad de sonido!La utilizo para reuniones con amigos, ejercicio en casa y en el trabajo.Muy superior a bocinas económicas
